============================================
core/subroutines/nested_with_args
============================================

function void foo();
    a.b.c(.arg1(arg1), .arg2(arg2));
endfunction

----

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    (function_body_declaration
      (data_type_or_void)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (function_statement_or_null
        (function_statement
          (statement
            (statement_item
              (subroutine_call_statement
                (subroutine_call
                  (method_call
                    (primary
                      (hierarchical_identifier
                        (simple_identifier)
                        (simple_identifier)))
                    (method_call_body
                      name: (simple_identifier)
                      arguments: (list_of_arguments
                        (simple_identifier)
                        (expression
                          (primary
                            (hierarchical_identifier
                              (simple_identifier))))
                        (simple_identifier)
                        (expression
                          (primary
                            (hierarchical_identifier
                              (simple_identifier))))))))))))))))
